Text: Good work, gang! This Bone is a real big find too.
Are you hurt, Zeta?

I'm okay. I don't feel as worn out as last time.
I think you should be seeing to her, honestly.
Ungh... I can...still...fight...
Don't overdo it. You're about to pass out.
No, I'm not...! Zeta's...more tired...than me...!

Even that's a competition for you, huh... All of us
were exhausted after our first time.
...This Bone... Hmm...
Oh yeah, are you okay, Eta? You look kinda sleepy...

I'm always sleepy... More importantly...I think...
we may have trouble...
What do you mean?

Evil spirits...have never appeared...this frequently
before... It's possible...something unusual is
happening...

Also...the spirits are growing stronger than
before... We barely beat this one...and there
were four of us...

So, lemme see... You're saying the next one is gonna
be even tougher?

If so, this is no time for celebrating. Any ideas,
Nuru?

Sorry, but I don't have any more details as to the
cause either.

Then...further investigation is needed... When such
a time comesâ€”

I'll have you all help...as members of the
Photography Club...
Huh? Does that mean...
...You accept us as friends now?
Eta... Thank you. We're very glad to have met you.

Yeah... The more I think about it...friends might
not be such a bad thing to have...

That way...I can do different experiments... All
those things I couldn't do by myself... Heheheh...!

Why do I get the feeling she sees us more as test
subjects...

I'm sure that's not it... Definitely not. We have to
trust Eta.

Ugh, boring!!! You guys keep talking about all this
difficult stuff I don't understand!
I'm hungry! Gimme some fried noodle rolls!
Uh, no? Our match ended in a draw, remember?

I'll buy you some. You did really well out there
just now.
Really?! You're the best, Alpha!!!
I think...I'm getting hungry, too...
...Somebody sure got bold fast.
Heehee, well, so be it. Today will be my treat.

Is everyone here? Okay, let's convene our second
emergency session.
Second? What was the first...?
Old news. So, what's on the docket this time?

Our future activities and investigations. But before
we get to thatâ€”
We need a name...
Is the Photography Club not the Photography Club?

That's our official name... What we're talking
about...is name to use when we do our secret
business...like fighting evil spirits, or collecting
Bones...

Having different names would keep our operations
nice and distinct. All I ask is that it be something
cool!
Okey-dokey! I say "The Delta is Best Club"!
Motion rejected.
No?!

Hmm, that's too far from what we do. Since this is
all hush-hush, maybe something with "shadow"?
"Shadow"... Okay, then in that caseâ€”
How about "Shadow Garden"?
"Shadow Garden"... I can dig that! It sounds cool!
I think it's...good, too...
Zeta?

I agree too, of course. So, what say we have a party
to celebrate the birth of Shadow Garden?

That's a good idea, even if it did come from Zeta!
I'll go buy lots of snacks!

Ugh... Preparing and clean up after will be a
pain... No thanks...

Well then, how about we just take a photo to
commemorate the moment for now? A way
to remember how this all started.
I like it! You remember how to use the timer?

I've mastered it, thanks to a very gifted teacher.
Now, line up, everyone.
(So, I go to this setting andâ€”)

Squeeze in closer, Delta. Alpha won't fit in the
shot.
I wanna be in the middle! You move!
Heh...
Come on, no fighting. Three, two, oneâ€”
Well? How's it look?
I'll check now.
Can you see me?!
Stop yelling...

Calm down, you guys... Sheesh. Heehee, I think it
looks pretty good, don't you?
I'm glad it turned out so wellâ€”
(Huh...? Everything's...getting hazyâ€”)
(Mm... Where am I...?)

(Oh... Seems I dozed off again. I feel like was
having the longest dream...)
Huh?! What's that sound, that rumbling...
You stupid cat! Stop running!

Can't you tell the difference between dodging and
running, fleabag?
...Hup.
Wha?! Look out!
It blew up... Are you serious, Eta?!
That's what you get for disrupting my research!
...Uh-oh.
L-Lady Alpha?!

It seems you all are making quite the ruckus.
Have you finished your reports?
...Change of plan. Securing an escape route...

Oh no you don't. *sigh* I think this time you're all
in need of a hard lesson.
Now, sit down over there, all of you.
(These three never change...)

(But what is this strange sadness I feel? It's like
I woke up from a happy dream...)

And thus Alpha begins scolding Delta and the others,
her heart filled with a puzzling melancholyâ€”
